name: Zombie Wave Survival
description:
They're infinite, mindless, ravaging, and headed straight for you...

Zombie Wave Survival (Name TBD) is a game that puts you and up to 3 other local players in a fight against countless hoards of undead. Use skill, strategy, and a buttload of bullets to get to the highest round you can. 

Killing zombies gives you points which you can spend on weapons and ammunition. You can also use these points to unlock pathways and secrets around the map. Be careful, as not all secrets were meant to be uncovered...

The game currently has:

  • 4 playable characters
  • 15 different weapons + grenades
  • 1 map with 8 areas
  • Keyboard and Mouse support
  • Gamepad Support
  • Local Co-op with up to 4 individual players
  • And infinite zombies...

Zombie Wave Survival (Name TBD) is a project still in development, and will remain free until it enters it's beta stage. If you're interested in following the latest features you can check out it's Trello Board here. If you're interested in being a part of the development process you can use the F12 key to submit feedback at any time during the game. 

Character Models made by Polygon Blacksmith.
